name: Tubeworms Zero: Assault On the Headless Man
name_original: Tubeworms Zero: Assault On the Headless Man
description:
"I See Him!" - Poor Hapless Fool rushing to his destructionMUSIC BY: AKTIVEHATE http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Aktivehate/

If ever there were a time to be upset about Tubeworms, surely that time is now. In a strange world, in The Tube, a classic battle of Red versus Blue plays out. The twist? Red has no head! See how it goes down* in Tubeworms Zero: A Place Out of Time AKA Assault On the Headless Man...

"you gotta apolgize to me onn your game so we match" - Marie

*Hold W to move forward
